import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const CartItems = () => { const { getTotalCartAmount, all_product, cartItems, removeFromCart } = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Remove

{all_product.map((e) => { if (cartItems[e.id] > 0) { return

{e.title}

Rs{e.new_price}

Rs{e.new_price * cartItems[e.id]}

{ removeFromCart(e.id) }} alt='' />
} return null })}

Total

Rs{getTotalCartAmount()}

) }
